values.description: = True floating state where PropertyManager page lives inside new docking pane; a single floating window owns all PropertyManager pages of all open documents
= Old-style PropertyManager page embedded in tabs at top

= Quasi floating state where PropertyManager page automatically displays, resizes itself in the lower-left corner of model frame window, and covers the FeatureManager design tree; one window for each open document

= Quasi floating state where PropertyManager page automatically displays, resizes itself in the lower-right corner of the model frame window, covers the graphic area, and has full height; one window for each open document

= Quasi floating state where PropertyManager page automatically displays, resizes itself to the right of the FeatureManager design tree, covers the graphics area, and has full height.; one window for each open document
